column1: Pope Francis prayed for an end to the #coronavirus pandemic &amp
column2: the development of a vaccine at an outdoor gathering of people impacted by #Covid-19 in the Vatican Gardens. The event signaling a return to normalcy after more than two months under lockdown. http://ow.ly/wiSp50zUCyV

column1: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announce the first case of person-to-person transmission of the Wuhan coronavirus. There are now six confirmed cases of coronavirus in the U.S. http://ow.ly/JXBl50y9wKw
